io.micronaut.discovery.consul.client.v1

Interface ConsulOperations

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ConsulClient
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractConsulClient

    public interface ConsulOperations
    API operations for Consul.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    graemerocher

    • Method Detail

      • putValue

        @Put(uri="/kv/{key}",
     consumes="text/plain")
 @Produces(value="text/plain",
          single=true)
Publisher<Boolean> putValue(String key,
                                                                                                                                    @Body
                                                                                                                                    String value)
        Writes a value for the given key to Consul.
        Parameters:
        key - The key
        value - The value as a String
        Returns:
        A Publisher that emits a boolean if the operation succeeded

      • readValues

        @Get(value="/kv/{key}?recurse")
 @Produces(single=true)
Publisher<List<KeyValue>> readValues(String key)
        Reads a Key from Consul. See https://www.consul.io/api/kv.html.
        Parameters:
        key - The key to read
        Returns:
        A Publisher that emits a list of KeyValue

      • readValues

        @Get(value="/kv/{key}?recurse=true{&dc}{&raw}{&seperator}")
 @Produces(single=true)
 @Retryable(attempts="${consul.client.config.retryCount:3}",
           delay="${consul.client.config.retryDelay:1s}")
Publisher<List<KeyValue>> readValues(String key,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                @Nullable @Parameter(value="dc")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                String datacenter,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                @Nullable
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Boolean raw,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                @Nullable
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                String seperator)
        Reads a Key from Consul. See https://www.consul.io/api/kv.html.
        Parameters:
        key - The key
        datacenter - The data center
        raw - Whether the value should be raw without encoding or metadata
        seperator - The separator to use
        Returns:
        A Publisher that emits a list of KeyValue

      • pass

        @Put(value="/agent/check/pass/{checkId}{?note}")
Publisher<HttpStatus> pass(String checkId,
                                                                            @Nullable
                                                                            String note)
        Pass the TTL check. See https://www.consul.io/api/agent/check.html.
        Parameters:
        checkId - The check ID
        note - An optional note
        Returns:
        An HttpStatus of HttpStatus.OK if all is well

      • register

        @Put(value="/catalog/register")
 @Produces(single=true)
Publisher<Boolean> register(@NotNull @Body
                                                                                    @NotNull CatalogEntry entry)
        Register a new CatalogEntry. See https://www.consul.io/api/catalog.html.
        Parameters:
        entry - The entry to register
        Returns:
        A Publisher that emits a boolean true if the operation was successful

      • register

        @Put(value="/agent/service/register")
 @Retryable(attempts="${consul.client.registration.retryCount:3}",
           delay="${consul.client.registration.retryDelay:1s}")
Publisher<HttpStatus> register(@NotNull @Body
                                                                                                                                                                                                        @NotNull NewServiceEntry entry)

        Parameters:
        entry - The entry to register
        Returns:
        A Publisher that emits a boolean true if the operation was successful

      • deregister

        @Put(value="/agent/service/deregister/{service}")

Publisher<HttpStatus> deregister(@NotNull
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      @NotNull String service)
        Register a new CatalogEntry. See https://www.consul.io/api/catalog.html.
        Parameters:
        service - The service to register
        Returns:
        A Publisher that emits a boolean true if the operation was successful

      • getHealthyServices

        @Get(value="/health/service/{service}{?passing,tag,dc}")
 @Produces(single=true)
Publisher<List<HealthEntry>> getHealthyServices(@NotNull
                                                                                                                                 @NotNull String service,
                                                                                                                                 Optional<Boolean> passing,
                                                                                                                                 Optional<String> tag,
                                                                                                                                 Optional<String> dc)

        service - The service
        passing - The passing parameter
        tag - The tag
        dc - The dc
        Returns:
        The HealthEntry instances

        @Get(value="/catalog/nodes?dc={datacenter}")
 @Produces(single=true)
Publisher<List<CatalogEntry>> getNodes(@NotNull
                                                                                                            @NotNull String datacenter)
        Gets all the nodes for the given data center.
        Parameters:
        datacenter - The data center
        Returns:
        A publisher that emits the nodes

      • getServiceNames

        @Get(value="/catalog/services")
 @Produces(single=true)
Publisher<Map<String,List<String>>> getServiceNames()
        Gets all of the service names and optional tags.
        Returns:
        A Map where the keys are service names and the values are service tags

      • getHealthyServices
